Text:
man, you are starting to go on my nerves

why are you making comment on every of my videos

if you dont like Russian porn please dont download it

go and watch whatever you want and leave me alone
its probably cuz you consistently incorrectly title your uploads. hes not the only one commenting on this

As I see he does not like Russian porn, he does not complain about titles :S

Also sometimes it is hard to make all titles correctly when you seed +10 posts per day. It is all porn, title does not make difference, I guess

The thing is that Im working hard to seed all my videos and to share them with people who want to see them, and he is constantly attacking me. It is easy for him to copy the same haters comment. And as I see he does not have any posted video.
